channel.title: Cache problem
channel.description:
im using bluurs client and server and sometimes, random objects pop up.
like in tzhaar the lvl 149 guys. there made of vesta bodies... i dont even have that on my server lol
how can i fix it?
examples:
wtf sword in a tree [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/5177/54725759.jpg[/img]
pvp armor that i dont have on my server [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/8468/64667458.jpg[/img]
ancient magic teleport
[img]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/8794/82117421.jpg[/img]
pvp armor in tzhaar-whatevers [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/1928/75957094.jpg[/img]

item.title: Cache problem
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

k i figured this out 2 weeks ago lol.

sorry ive only been coding 2 months

and i cant find what blocked out my acient magics tele, i sorted all my models and found a halo plasma blade lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache problem
item.dc:creator: @BoneArmyProductions BoneArmyProductions
item.description:
@BoneArmyProductions wrote:

Common sense?? you used the model id for ur new items such as pk armour. and an npc part the sword is from zammy boss. the model id that you added was the same with the original things thats y it comes up like that

Read full topic
